trans-unit.source: Declaratively instructs the .NET Framework to perform time validation on a configuration property.
trans-unit.target: 以宣告方式指示 .NET Framework 在組態屬性上執行時間驗證。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidatorAttribute> attribute to decorate a configuration property.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidatorAttribute>屬性裝飾的組態屬性。

trans-unit.source: This instructs the .NET Framework to validate the property using a <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator> object and pass the value of the decorating parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這會指示要驗證屬性使用的.NET Framework<xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator>物件，並將裝飾的參數值傳遞。

trans-unit.source: You can apply <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidatorAttribute> objects only to property types.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidatorAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidatorAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You use this constructor in the attributed model to ensure that the type of the value assigned to the related property is a positive <xref:System.TimeSpan> object.
trans-unit.target: 屬性化的模型中使用這個建構函式以確保指派至相關的屬性值的類型為正<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidatorAttribute.ValidatorInstance%2A> property to perform positive <xref:System.TimeSpan> object validation by calling the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidatorAttribute.ValidatorInstance%2A>屬性來執行正數<xref:System.TimeSpan>藉由呼叫物件驗證<xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。
